artifacts.summary: Deep analysis of families closed under temporal shift, presaturation, and linearity forcing totality. Identifies three viable paths: constant-family truth lemma, two-tier BMCS, or fixing DovetailingChain sorries. The fundamental blocker is that constant witness families cannot satisfy temporal coherence (backward G requires phi -> G(phi) which is not a valid inference), requiring either truth lemma restructuring or non-constant witness families.

partial_progress.details: Round 2 research complete. Exhaustive analysis of all viable strategies for combining modal saturation with temporal coherence in a single BMCS construction.
